QuestData.Title: Turning the Tidemistress
QuestData.Description: The Tidemistress has fallen back to the elven ruins and is licking her wounds.$B$BHer guard is undoubtedly protecting her. To best her, you will have to break her defenses.$B$BConstruct a ballista using the parts that you salvaged and end her once and for all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Construct a Makeshift Ballista and kill Tidemistress Sashj'tar in the Sashj'tar Ruins.
QuestData.CompletionText: We finally have the advantage against the Sashj'tar.$B$BNow is the time to kill the Tidemistress.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done it, $n. You have slain the Tidemistress and saved Jandvik from the Sashj'tar.
